Companylọ ọrụ traktọ Algerian ATC Spa, bụ ụlọ ọrụ jikọrọ aka pụrụ iche na mmepe nke igwe ọrụ ugbo
Amepụtara ya na August 16, 2012 mgbe nkwekọrịta n'etiti ụlọ ọrụ Algerian Etrag na American Group AGCO
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-emepụta traktọ na El Khroub, nso Constantine, Algeria.
Etrag mechiri mmekorita nke ulo oru na ahia ya na AGCO,  onye ndu uwa n'imeputa igwe ugbo. Ha mepụtara na 16 Ọgọstụ 2012 otu njikọ aka (njikọ ọrụ) a na-akpọ Algerian Tractors Company ATC Spa
Nkwekọrịta ahụ nwere ndị mmekọ obodo abụọ: ETRAG nwere (36%), Pmat nwere (15%) na AGCO nwere (41%).
Ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe na-emepụta otu traktọ Etrag na ọtụtụ traktọ Massey Ferguson.
